alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:02AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Union and Essex Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Martinsville, or near Plainfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainfield, Bloomfield, Orange, Summit, Millburn, Caldwell, Fairfield, Union, East Orange, Irvington, West Orange, Montclair, Belleville, Westfield and Livingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Western Essex; Western Union
